name: Cat Racer HD (PC VERSION)
description:
Addicting games, the little cute racing cat games has ever made . the main character was a cute little cat name COMOT. along with it, you have to face the challenges of unique environments. Also, gain cat coin by collect it along the track to buy a power-up such as a coin magnet and speed up power. There also include Bos battle! 

-fun
-cute character
-cute sound effect
-high-quality gameplay
-action games
